welcome.message: Welcome to our application. We're glad to have you here!

invalid_parameter.message: Oops, the query parameters are not valid. Please check and try again.

missing_data.message: Some query parameters are missing. Please provide all required information.

not_found.message: Sorry, the requested data could not be found.

no_permission.message: Oops, you don't have the necessary permissions to perform this action.

invalid_data.message: The data you provided is not valid. Please double-check your input.

no_file_pass.message: Oops, no file was uploaded. Please attach a file and try again.

server_error.message: Oops, server internal error. Please try again later.
